TopicTitle: NASA/Air Traffic Control Commentary Audio Loops

Articles.Content:
I would like a mod (maybe it already exists) that would provide live per launch audio commentary from various members of NASA/Air Traffic controllers. It would be like the already available "Chatterer" mod- but I'd prefer if it was coherent and human English. I'd like it if the player would be able to select an audio loop (for example: Apollo 11 pre-launch+postlaunch commentary/Apollo 11 random operations chatter (randomly asking for random systems operations and maintenance during no specific portion of the mission)/Apollo 11 landing commentary (same for STS-1,2,3 etc/Mercury Freedom, Liberty Belle, Friendship etc).

Maybe this already exists but if it does please drop a link! If not- anyone else like this idea?

Somewhat interestingly, Chatterer already uses some audio from (amongst other sources) Apollo 11 voice recordings. I believe it gets reversed and passed through some filtering to produce the Kerbalese sounds.

I suspect Chatterer is a fine base for what you want, perhaps just by replacing the audio files it ships with with [actual Apollo recordings](https://www.nasa.gov/mission_pages/apollo/40th/apollo11_audio.html).
